caption.p: a) Effect of varying doses of Aqueous Leaf Extract of S. glauca (AESG) on Body Weight (g) of Male Wistar Rats after 30 days. b) Percentage Changes in body weight of Male Wistar Rats administered Respective doses of AESG after 30 days. Data with similar lower-case alphabet are not significantly different ( p < 0.05); data with different lower-case alphabets are significantly different ( p < 0.05). Data are presented as Mean Â± SD.
